headlines.description: Watford were relegated from the Premier League on Sunday after losing a thrilling 3-2 defeat at the hands of Arsenal.
headlines.shortLinkText: Watford relegated after battling loss at Arsenal

headlines.description: Burnley suffered their first home defeat since New Year's Day as they were beaten 2-1 by Brighton & Hove Albion
headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton end Burnley's home run with win at Tu

headlines.description: Chelsea clinched their place in next season's Champions League with a 2-0 victory over Wolves to finish their Premier League campaign on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea reach UCL with victory over Wolves

headlines.description: Tottenham secured sixth-place in the Premier League and a place in the Europa League next season despite failing to beat Crystal Palace.
headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs reach Europa League despite Palace draw

headlines.description: Bournemouth fought gallantly but end their five-year stay in the Premier League with an entertaining 3-1 win against Everton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bournemouth down with win as Villa escape

headlines.description: Manchester United claimed a top four spot with a 2-0 win against Leicester City on the final day of the Premier League season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man Utd earn UCL spot with win at Leicester

headlines.description: Manchester City wrapped up their Premier League campaign with an emphatic 5-0 victory over already relegated Norwich City on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: De Bruyne ties assist mark as Man City thrash Norwich

headlines.description: Divock Origi scored as champions Liverpool came from behind to close out their Premier League season with a 3-1 win at Newcastle.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool end title season with win at Newcastle

headlines.description: Sheffield United's hopes of finishing their season on a high were dashed when they were beaten 3-1 by Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
headlines.shortLinkText: Southampton come from behind to beat Sheffield United 3-1

events.name: Aston Villa at West Ham United

headlines.description: Aston Villa preserved their Premier League status with a nerve-racking 1-1 draw at West Ham United on Sunday thanks to a late goal by Jack Grealish.
headlines.shortLinkText: Grealish helps Aston Villa survive with draw
